config.captionsEnabled.tooltip: Disabling this setting will turn off all caption functionality from this mod.
config.fontScaling.tooltip: A multiplier for the caption font size. Default 1.
config.maxVisibleCaptions.tooltip: The max number of captions to be shown at once (to prevent UI clutter).
config.minDurationTicks.tooltip: The minimum length a caption is shown for before fading out. 1 sec is approximately 60 game ticks.
config.categories.paragraph: The following links go link to other pages where you can turn individual captions on and off.
